entry.title: Ukraine Fends Off Russian Assaults in the East
entry.content: Kyiv said its forces had repelled multiple Russian attacks around Bakhmut, as Moscowâ€™s troops pushed to encircle the besieged city.

entry.title: In Besieged Bakhmut, Everyday Life Is a Struggle to Survive
entry.content: A city of some 80,000 before the war, the eastern Ukrainian city is now home to barely a few thousand who endure hardship every day, as Russian forces press forward house by house and bombard it with artillery.
